1{-# LANGUAGE RecordWildCards #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
4
5-- | Internal representation of relational data resource.
6--   Data resource bundles data themselves and calculation stuffs.
7--   In Koshucode, data is represented as set of judgements,
8--   and calculation is as relation-to-relation mapping.
9--   This internal representation is usually constructed from
10--   computer files or web resources addressed by URI.
11--   Result of calculation on some resource becomes also data resource.
12
13module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Resource
14  ( -- * Data type
15    Resource (..), AbResource,
16    resIncluded, resInput, resInputPoint,
17    resClass, resFeature,
18    resMessagesAdd,
19
20    -- * Input queue
21    InputQueue, resQueueTodo, resQueueDone,
22
23    -- * Hook
24    Assert, ConsRelmap, Global,
25    RelkitHook, Relmap, RelmapLinkTable,
26    Rop, RopCons, Intmed,
27    ShortAssert, ShortAsserts,
28    global,
29  ) where
30
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture             as O
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                 as B
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax               as S
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                 as D
35import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert          as C
36import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap          as C
37import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit          as C
38import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap          as C
39
40
41-- ----------------------  Data type
42
43-- | Relational data resource
44data Resource c = Resource
45    { resGlobal     :: Global c            -- ^ Global parameter
46    , resOption     :: C.Option c          -- ^ Options
47    , resImport     :: [Resource c]        -- ^ Importing resources
48    , resExport     :: [String]            -- ^ Exporting names
49    , resSlot       :: [S.NamedTrees]      -- ^ Global slots
50    , resLexmap     :: [C.LexmapClause]    -- ^ Source of relmaps
51    , resAssert     :: [ShortAssert c]     -- ^ Assertions of relmaps
52    , resJudge      :: [D.Judge c]         -- ^ Affirmative or denial judgements
53    , resInputQueue :: InputQueue          -- ^ Input points
54    , resOutput     :: B.IOPoint           -- ^ Output point
55    , resEcho       :: [[S.TokenLine]]     -- ^ Echo text
56    , resLicense    :: [(C.SecNo, String)] -- ^ License text
57    , resMessage    :: [String]            -- ^ Collection of messages
58    , resLastSecNo  :: C.SecNo             -- ^ Last section number
59    , resCacheT     :: D.CacheT            -- ^ Term name cache
60    , resSelect     :: D.RelSelect c       -- ^ Relation selector
61    }
62
63instance Show (Resource c) where
64    show Resource { resInputQueue = q }
65        = "Resources " ++ show q
66
67instance D.SelectRel Resource where
68    selectRel Resource { resSelect = sel } = sel
69
70instance C.GetGlobal Resource where
71    getGlobal Resource { resGlobal = g } = g
72
73-- | Resource that has no contents.
74instance (D.CContent c) => B.Default (Resource c) where
75    def = Resource
76           { resGlobal     = global
77           , resOption     = C.option
78           , resImport     = []
79           , resExport     = []
80           , resSlot       = []
81           , resLexmap     = []
82           , resAssert     = []
83           , resJudge      = []
84           , resInputQueue = (B.def, [])
85           , resOutput     = B.IOPointStdout
86           , resEcho       = []
87           , resLicense    = []
88           , resMessage    = []
89           , resLastSecNo  = 0
90           , resCacheT     = D.cacheT
91           , resSelect     = \_ _ -> D.reldee
92           }
93
94-- | Abort or resource.
95type AbResource c = B.Ab (Resource c)
96
97-- | Included sources, i.e., done-part of input queue.
98resIncluded :: Resource c -> [B.NIOPoint]
99resIncluded Resource { resInputQueue = (_, done) } = done
100
101-- | 'B.IOPoint' of all inputs.
102resInput :: Resource c -> [B.IOPoint]
103resInput = map C.inputPoint . resInputPoint
104
105-- | All input points.
106resInputPoint :: Resource c -> [C.InputPoint]
107resInputPoint Resource { resInputQueue = (q, done) } = ps where
108    ps = B.qTo q ++ map (ip . B.nioPoint) done
109    ip p = C.InputPoint p []
110
111-- | List of all judgement classes.
112resClass :: Resource c -> [D.JudgeClass]
113resClass Resource {..} = map (C.assClass . S.shortBody) resAssert
114
115-- | Get feature from resource.
116resFeature :: Resource c -> C.Feature
117resFeature res = C.globalFeature $ resGlobal res
118
119-- | Add messages.
120resMessagesAdd :: [String] -> O.Map (Resource c)
121resMessagesAdd msg res = res { resMessage = msg ++ resMessage res }
122
123
124-- ----------------------  Input queue
125
126-- | Queue for input code: /todo/, /ready/ and /done/.
127type InputQueue = (B.Queue C.InputPoint, [B.NIOPoint])
128
129-- | Map to input queue.
130resQueueMap :: O.Map InputQueue -> O.Map (Resource c)
131resQueueMap f res@Resource {..} = res { resInputQueue = f resInputQueue }
132
133-- | Add input to todo-part of input queue.
134resQueueTodo :: C.InputPoint -> O.Map (Resource c)
135resQueueTodo t = resQueueMap todo where
136    todo (q, done) = (B.enq t q, done)
137
138-- | Add input to done-part of input queue.
139resQueueDone :: B.NIOPoint -> O.Map (Resource c)
140resQueueDone d = resQueueMap push where
141    push (q, done) = (q, d:done)
142
143
144-- ----------------------  Hook
145
146-- | Assertion of relation.
147type Assert          c = C.Assert'          Resource c
148
149-- | Relmap construction.
150type ConsRelmap      c = C.ConsRelmap'      Resource c
151
152-- | Global parameter.
153type Global          c = C.Global'          Resource c
154
155-- | Generic relmap.
156type Relmap          c = C.Relmap'          Resource c
157
158-- | Make relkit with data resource.
159type RelkitHook      c = C.RelkitHook'      Resource c
160
161-- | Lexmap-to-relmap table.
162type RelmapLinkTable c = C.RelmapLinkTable' Resource c
163
164-- | Relmap operator.
165type Rop             c = C.Rop'             Resource c
166
167-- | Constructor of relmap operator.
168type RopCons         c = C.RopCons'         Resource c
169
170-- | Intermediate relmap.
171type Intmed          c = C.Intmed'          Resource c
172
173-- | Assertion with short signs.
174type ShortAssert     c = C.ShortAssert'     Resource c
175
176-- | Assertion list with short signs.
177type ShortAsserts    c = C.ShortAsserts'    Resource c
178
179-- | Default global parameter.
180global :: (D.CContent c) => Global c
181global = C.global' B.def
182
